itemDescription: British YouTuber, streamer, commentator and eSports player

wikipedia_page.main: Thomas George Cassell (born 23 June 1993), better known online as Syndicate (formerly TheSyndicateProject), is an English YouTuber and Twitch streamer. On August 17, 2014, he became the first person on Twitch to reach 1 million followers.Cassell registered his YouTube channel, "TheSyndicateProject" in 2010, and rapidly built a following by posting gaming–commentary videos and video game walkthroughs, primarily on the Call of Duty franchise and Minecraft.

response: * Tom Cassell, YouTuber, currently has over 10 million subscribers on his main channel TheSyndicateProject.
* Loki appears in the mobile game, Marvel Avengers Academy, voiced by Tom Cassell.
*Tom Cassell a.k.a. Syndicate: famous YouTube gamer

* Tom Cassell (better known as Syndicate or The Syndicate Project), popular gaming commentator on YouTube. He left the college to pursue his YouTube career and has since amassed over 12.5 million subscribers.
